title: WTB:  The new OJ book - Joe G, Jay, etc.

posts.post_title: WTB:  The new OJ book - Joe G, Jay, etc.
posts.post_content:
Hi guys,

I wanted to buy one of your OJ books if you have any left, but couldn't find the purchase info.  (OK.  I didn't actually look very hard for it.)

Can someone post the order info?   This will be my consolation gift for getting shut out of REA.   This and a nice card from somewhere.  :rolleyes:

Thx,

J

JoAnn, here is information:

Send Check or Money order to:
Richard Masson
1158 26th Street #537
Santa Monica, Ca.  90403

This is info from the latest Old Cardboard magazine.

Joe Maples

JoAnn,

You're going to really, really like this book.
